scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two bound volumes containing records, ca. 1870-1900, of the Madison School Districtof Charlotte County, including the "Account Book and Record of the official acts of the Clerk of the Board School Trustees of Madison School District, Charlotte County, Virginia, " 1870-1891, kept by William M. Marshall. Included in this volume is a census of persons between the ages of five and twenty-one years taken between November 24th and December 24th, 1870, and reported to the County Superintendent. The second volume, "The VirginiaPublic School Register," 1894-1900, contains handwritten names and attendance records of students for Pine Dale White Schoolof the Madison School District.
